nodes.text: Draxus was a male member of the Dread Host, the armies of the Dread Masters during the Galactic War. During the Dread War on Oricon, Draxus was the Gate Commander of the Dread Fortress, commanding the Dread Host forces that defended the fortress' main gate. Draxus was slain along with many of the defenders in the final assault on the Dread Masters.
Gate Commander Draxus appears as the second boss in the Operation "The Dread Fortress," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.4.
